The doctors diagnosed her with a chronic autoimmune disease, explaining why she couldn't gain weight. We had always thought her metabolism was the cause. Surprisingly, the fainting revealed this condition, as it is a frequent symptom of the disease. This turning point allowed us to understand her health issues better.
